articles.author: Ashley Hume
articles.title: Paula Abdul sues 'American Idol' executive producer Nigel Lythgoe for sexual assault: reports - Fox News
articles.description: Paula Abdul filed a lawsuit alleging that "American Idol" and "So You Think You Can Dance" executive producer Nigel Lythgoe twice sexually assaulted her.
articles.content:
Paula Abdul has sued "American Idol" and "So You Think You Can Dance" executive producer Nigel Lythgoe for sexual assault, according to multiple reports.
In a lawsuit filed on Friday in Los Angeles,… [+5085 chars]
